description: This file defines a Flutter widget named ProductDetailScreen that displays detailed information about a book, including its title, author, cover image, and description, using various imported packages and custom widgets.

classes.name: ProductDetailScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that constructs a detailed view of a book, using a bookId to retrieve data and displaying it with custom background and layout.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ProductDetailScreen, displaying the book's title, author, cover image, and description.
